attributes.action: Increase Help to Buy ISA and LISA property price cap or remove cap completely.
attributes.additional_details:
Many people are struggeling to buy property due to high housing prices. People have been saving using Help to buy Isa and LISa, to qualify for the goverment bonus. I have reached the stage to buy a house with my husband, but I am unable to as house prices in our are are over £250k, so 4 years of saving and relying on goverment bonus are gone. It is heartbreaking, i know we arent the only ones in the same position. I would like to ask cap to be increased or removed completely.
Thank you
attributes.background:
Increase the cap of Help to Buy and  Lifetime ISA house price cap
Help to buy ISA and LISA encourage people to save for their first home, worth less than £250k outside London and  £450k outside London by offering a  government bonus. Average house prices across the country have risen dramatically.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions, which make similar requests:

Increase the price cap for the Help to Buy ISA scheme outside of London
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614815

Increase the value of the property you can buy with a Lifetime ISA to £550k
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606409
